Function slice_and_rebin

boost::histogram::algorithm::slice_and_rebin — Slice and rebin command to be used in reduce.

Synopsis

// In header: <boost/histogram/algorithm/reduce.hpp>


reduce_command 
slice_and_rebin(unsigned iaxis, axis::index_type begin, axis::index_type end, 
                unsigned merge, slice_mode mode = slice_mode::shrink);

Description

Command is applied to axis with given index.

To slice andrebin in one command (see the respective commands for more details). Equivalent to passing both commands for the same axis toreduce.

Parameters:

begin

first index that should be kept.

end

one past the last index that should be kept.

iaxis

which axis to operate on.

merge

how many adjacent bins to merge into one.

mode

slice mode, see slice_mode.
